raptorific:

The fact that wizard law enforcement found a dudeâs finger and immediately closed the investigation, declared him dead, and concluded that the only possible explanation for why they only found a finger was that he was killed so hard that the rest of him was obliterated kind of speaks volumes about why nobody followed up when the genocidal serial killer just vanished.

The Ministry of Magic is fucking useless.

To be fair, both cases tangentially involved a wizard so powerful that the government refuses to use the name he adopted for himself, let alone his birth name. I’m imagining a policeman going, “hmm, this looks like it might be the work of You-K…”, before stopping, aghast, and looking frantically around for ghostly apparitions. “Looks like a terrible accident to me. Let’s stop for the night and go home”, his superior mutters, before finally mumbling, “… and hug our kids before it’s too late.”
